title: An Act promoting resilience against the heat-related impacts of climate change

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Creem, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2244) of Cynthia Stone Creem for legislation to promote resilience against the heat-related impacts of climate change.  Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

related_entities.name: committee on Telecommunications, Utilities and Energy

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/25/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/25/2025 from 01:00 PM-04:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                                   and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
